sw-order-detail.payPalCarrierDescription: If you want to change the carrier for this PayPal order, click here
sw-order-detail.payPalCarrierHelpText: You can set and change the default shipping carrier for PayPal in the shipping methods. However, this will have no effect on orders that have already been placed.

sw-settings-payment-detail.tooltip: Go to the PayPal extension settings → and activate PayPal Commerce Platform to activate this payment method.

sw-settings-payment-list.needOnboardingTooltip: Complete the onboarding to activate this payment method

cross-border.crossBorderMessagingEnable: Enable cross-border localization of Pay Later message
cross-border.infoText: Pay Later messaging is a feature that allows you to display a Pay Later message in the language of the customer. This feature is only available for certain countries. {0}
cross-border.warningText: Please contact your PayPal representative to enable this feature for your account.

errors.SWAG_PAYPAL_POS__EXISTING_POS_ACCOUNT: This Zettle account has already been configured in another Sales Channel
errors.SWAG_PAYPAL__API_NOT_AVAILABLE: PayPal services are currently unavailable. Please try again later.

swag-paypal.messageNotBlank: This value should not be blank.

button.description: Click this button to enable PayPal and select it as default in the selected Sales Channel
button.label: Set PayPal as default

acdcForce3DS.helpText: PayPal checks whether 3DS (Strong Customer Authentication) is required based on the credit or debit card presented. Setting this option will reject payment attempts without a 3DS check.
acdcForce3DS.label: Block payments from non-3DS countries

brandName.label: Your own brand name on PayPal page
brandName.tooltipText: This text will be displayed as the brand name on the PayPal payment page.

excludedProductIds.label: Excluded products
excludedProductIds.tooltipText: Products selected here cannot be purchased with PayPal.

excludedProductStreamIds.label: Excluded dynamic product groups
excludedProductStreamIds.tooltipText: Products included in the dynamic product groups selected here cannot be purchased with PayPal.

helpText.guest_checkout: Guest Checkout: The PayPal site displays a form for payment information, the customer does not need to log in.
helpText.login: Login: The PayPal site displays a login screen as landing page.
helpText.no_preference: No preference: PayPal decides which page is shown, depending on the previous interaction of the customer with PayPal.

loggingLevel.label: Debugging
loggingLevel.tooltipText: When using advanced debugging, additional data is recorded during checkout to detect potential errors. For temporary use only.

orderNumberPrefix.label: Order number prefix
orderNumberPrefix.tooltipText: This text is placed before the original order number (e.g MyShop_SW20001). This helps to identify the shop where the payment was made. You can find it as invoice ID in your PayPal dashboard.

orderNumberSuffix.label: Order number suffix
orderNumberSuffix.tooltipText: This text is placed after the original order number (e.g SW20001_MyShop). This helps to identify the shop where the payment was made. You can find it as invoice ID in your PayPal dashboard.

sendOrderNumber.helpText: If this option is active, the order number will be submitted to PayPal as invoice ID at checkout.
sendOrderNumber.label: Submit order number

submitCart.helpText: If this option is active, cart data will be submitted to PayPal at checkout.
submitCart.label: Submit cart

availabilityToolTip.oxxoapmhandler: OXXO is available for the following countries: Mexico
availabilityToolTip.p24apmhandler: Przelewy24 is available for the following countries: Poland
availabilityToolTip.paylaterhandler: Pay Later is available for the following countries: Australia, France, Germany, Italy, Spain, United Kingdom, United States

availabilityToolTip.sepahandler: SEPA Lastschrift is available for the following countries: Germany

checkout.banner: With PayPal Checkout, you can offer your customers payment by invoice, credit card and other local payment methods. PayPal Checkout supports you with the latest technology and brings you the highest flexibility. You keep your existing payment methods, and the fees remain the same! Activate PayPal Checkout and deactivate PayPal PLUS to avoid duplicate payment methods in your shop. More information

deactivatePayPalPlusModal.text: Congratulations! By switching to PayPal Checkout, you keep on using all relevant payment methods – now based on the latest technology.
deactivatePayPalPlusModal.title: Deactivate PayPal PLUS
deactivatePayPalPlusModal.warning: Avoid displaying duplicate payment methods and deactivate PayPal PLUS.

checkout.description: PayPal Checkout is the new all-in-one solution that lets you offer powerful flexibile payment processing features on the marketplaces and other commerce platforms.

domainAssociation.title: Please make sure your domain is set correctly for Apple Pay to work properly. The domain association file is already present.

checkout.header: More payment methods with one solution from PayPal

onboardingStatusTooltip.ineligible: PayPal informed us, that this payment method is currently ineligible for your account.
onboardingStatusTooltip.limited: PayPal informed us, that this payment method has some limitations for your account.
onboardingStatusTooltip.mybank: Merchants enabling MyBank after February 2023 will need manual approval by PayPal. Reach out to PayPal support for further information on this.

sandbox.helpText: Enable if you want to test the PayPal integration.
sandbox.label: Sandbox
sandbox.onlyLiveTooltip: You are only connected a live PayPal account so far.
sandbox.onlySandboxTooltip: You are only connected a sandbox PayPal account so far.

button.messageFetchedError: Try again or enter your credentials manually.
button.title: Get API credentials

clientId.label: Client ID
clientId.tooltipText: The REST API client ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

clientIdSandbox.label: Sandbox client ID
clientIdSandbox.tooltipText: The REST API client ID is used while testing to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

clientSecret.label: Client secret
clientSecret.tooltipText: The REST API client secret is used to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

clientSecretSandbox.label: Sandbox client secret
clientSecretSandbox.tooltipText: The REST API client secret is used while testing to authenticate this plugin with the PayPal API.

merchantPayerId.label: PayPal Merchant ID
merchantPayerId.tooltipText: The PayPal Merchant ID assigned to your PayPal account (see Business Information in PayPal account settings).

merchantPayerIdSandbox.label: Sandbox PayPal Merchant ID
merchantPayerIdSandbox.tooltipText: The PayPal Merchant ID assigned to your PayPal sandbox account (see Business Information in PayPal account settings).

sandbox.label: Enable sandbox
sandbox.tooltipText: Enable, if you want to test the PayPal integration.

express.alertMessage: Double opt-in for guests is activated in one of your Sales Channels. This feature is not compatible with PayPal Express Shortcut buttons. Customers who sign up via the Express Checkout Shortcut buttons won't receive double opt-in verification emails.
express.cardSubtitle: Express Checkouts increase the conversion rate in your shop and pose no financial risk to you as a merchant. It is recommended to keep them activated.

ecsButtonLanguageIso.helpText: If not set, the sales channel language will be used.
ecsButtonLanguageIso.label: Button locale

ecsCartEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on the cart.
ecsCartEnabled.label: 'PayPal Checkout' on cart

ecsDetailEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on each product detail page.
ecsDetailEnabled.label: 'PayPal Checkout' on detail page

ecsListingEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on listing pages.
ecsListingEnabled.label: 'PayPal Checkout' on listing pages

ecsLoginEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on the login and register page.
ecsLoginEnabled.label: 'PayPal Checkout' on login page

ecsOffCanvasEnabled.helpText: If this option is active, the Express Checkout button will be shown on the off-canvas cart.
ecsOffCanvasEnabled.label: 'PayPal Checkout' on off-canvas cart

ecsShowPayLater.helpText: The 'Pay Later' button will be displayed on the same pages and in the same design as the 'PayPal Checkout' button.
ecsShowPayLater.label: Display 'Pay Later' button next to the 'PayPal Checkout' button

ecsSubmitCart.helpText: If this option is active, the cart will be submitted to PayPal for Express orders.
ecsSubmitCart.label: Submit cart

installment.cardSubtitle: Banners increase the conversion rate in your shop and pose no financial risk to you as a merchant. It is recommended to keep them activated.

cart.helpText: If this option is active, the 'Pay Later' banner will be shown on the cart.
cart.label: 'Pay Later' banner on cart

detailPage.helpText: If this option is active, the 'Pay Later' banner will be shown on each product detail page.
detailPage.label: 'Pay Later' banner on detail page

footer.helpText: If this option is active, the 'Pay Later' banner will be shown on the footer.
footer.label: 'Pay Later' banner on footer

loginPage.helpText: If this option is active, the 'Pay Later' banner will be shown on the login and register page.
loginPage.label: 'Pay Later' banner on login page

offCanvasCart.helpText: If this option is active, the 'Pay Later' banner will be shown on the off-canvas cart.
offCanvasCart.label: 'Pay Later' banner on off-canvas cart

error.detail: The locale code you provided doesn't match the format required by PayPal. A valid format is "en_GB".

infobox.text: To see a list of valid locale codes click

settingForm.messageSaveSuccess: The PayPal settings have been saved.
settingForm.messageTestError: The API credentials could not be validated.
settingForm.messageTestSuccess: The API credentials have been validated.
settingForm.messageWebhookError: The webhook could not be saved. The following errors occurred:

plus.hint: Note: PayPal PLUS only works with the payment acquisition "Sale". It will be set automatically.
plus.introduction:
PayPal PLUS: Your complete all-in-one payment solution including PayPal, Direct Debit and Credit Card. PayPal PLUS offers your customers full flexibility in choosing their preferred payment method. Your advantages as a seller? Easier accounting with only one contracting party, one account and one transaction overview showing all incoming payments. You receive your money directly after customers complete the order process.
You can apply for PayPal PLUS here.

warning.active: PayPal Checkout provides the same payment methods to your customers – based on the latest technology. Activate PayPal Checkout now and deactivate PayPal PLUS to avoid displaying duplicate payment methods. More information
warning.inactive: Avoid displaying duplicate payment methods and deactivate PayPal PLUS. More information

customerServiceInstructions.helpText: These instructions will be submitted to PayPal & RatePay and shown in e-mails for the customer.
customerServiceInstructions.label: Customer service instructions for Pay upon invoice

spbAlternativePaymentMethodsEnabled.helpText: Alternative payment methods are credit- and debit cards and more.
spbAlternativePaymentMethodsEnabled.label: Enable the alternative payment methods for the Smart Payment Buttons.

spbButtonLanguageIso.helpText: If not set, the sales channel language will be used.
spbButtonLanguageIso.label: Button locale

spbShowPayLater.label: Display 'Pay Later' button next to PayPal button

description.text: Vaulting a PayPal account will allow you to charge the account in the future without requiring your customer to be present during the transaction or re-authenticate with PayPal when they are present during the transaction.
description.title: One-time Paypal checkout

enableACDC.label: Enable Vaulting for credit and debit cards

webhook.infoText: The webhook is used for updating the status of a transaction asynchronously. Incorrectly registered webhooks, e.g. on a different or not publicly available server, may result in unconfirmed transactions, regardless whether the transaction has been processed by PayPal.

detail.externalLinkText: Open dispute in PayPal resolution center
detail.title: PayPal dispute:

emptyState.subline: Change the filter to show all disputes.
emptyState.title: No disputes found

emptyStateNotAuthorized.subline: Go to the {link} for PayPal setup.
emptyStateNotAuthorized.title: No PayPal account setup

swag-paypal-frw-credentials.messageFetchedError: Try again or use the advanced settings to provide your credentials.
swag-paypal-frw-credentials.textIntroPayPal: To get PayPal up and running you only need to provide your PayPal API credentials.
swag-paypal-frw-credentials.tooltipSandbox: Depending on activation of the sandbox, separate credentials are saved.
swag-paypal-frw-credentials.tooltipSetDefault: PayPal will be set as default payment method of all Sales Channels. You can set individual default payment methods per Sales Channel in the settings module.

captureAction.isFinalHint: Hint: Marked as final capture, although not the entire amount is to be captured.

errorPage.canceledPaymentContent: An error occurred while retrieving payment details from PayPal. If you see this message, it was probably a payment that was cancelled by the customer. Cancelled payments will be deleted by PayPal after a while and are then no longer available.
errorPage.other: Payment details could not be retrieved from PayPal. It is likely that the payment was not completed by the customer, or was created with sandbox enabled and has now been requested with live data. Details for uncompleted payments are only available for about 6 hours on the PayPal side.
errorPage.title: Payment details not available

error.title: Error fetching payment details from PayPal

refundAmount.helpText: An amount of '0' will cause the refund of the complete payment
refundAmount.label: Amount

confirm.message: Do you really want to cancel this payment?

account.errorEmail: Your API key could not be verified

authentication.apiKeyDescription: API keys function like passwords. Shopware will use your Zettle API key to establish a secure connection to your Zettle account.
authentication.messageDuplicateError: This Zettle account has already been configured in another Sales Channel
authentication.messageTestError: The credentials could not be validated

disclaimer.headline: Zettle is a PayPal service
disclaimer.subheadline: Help increase sales through the power of PayPal. Get started for free.

content.firstLine: Your Zettle and Shopware accounts are now connected! You may now setup product synchronisation.
content.headline: Setup product synchronisation
content.secondLine: Once activated, Zettle will automatically be kept in sync with your Shopware products. Sales made through Zettle are also synchronized with Shopware and you can use the Administration to keep yourself up to date on Zettle and Shopware sales as well.

status.disabled: Synchronisation is not enabled, because your Sales Channel is disabled.

message.aborted: Last synchronisation was aborted by the user

status.syncingDetail: This could take a few minutes. This process runs in the background, meanwhile you can use your shop as usual.

runs.title: Synchronisation history
runs.toolbarText: "Clean up logs" will delete all logs. Logs older than 30 days will be removed automatically.

settings.activeHelpText: If active, the Zettle synchronisation will happen automatically in the background.
settings.domainHelpText: Zettle will use this domain to download media associated with your synchronized products. Zettle will only accept secure URLs (https).

reset.descriptionText: If you are experiencing issues, you may re-upload all products and images.
reset.modalConfirmText: This will reset the synchronisation history for the Sales Channel
reset.modalTextInfo: All items will be re-uploaded on the next synchronisation. This may take a while. You will not lose any data in Shopware, some data may be overwritten at Zettle.

settings.saveAlert: Saved changes are available after the currently running synchronisation between Shopware and Zettle ended.

emptyState.message: There are no products in your Sales Channel or dynamic product group.
emptyState.title: No products selected

salesChannelDetailDescription.title: Grow your business with Shopware and Zettle by PayPal

gettingStarted.appText:
Available for iOS and Android tablets and phones.
Connect your Zettle account and your card reader to start making sales.
gettingStarted.cardTitle: Get started with Zettle by PayPal
gettingStarted.readerHeadline: Login to Zettle to order your Zettle card reader
gettingStarted.readerText: Learn more about the card reader and order one right here:

swag-paypal-pos.messageCloneError: Could not transfer product visibility from another Sales Channel.
swag-paypal-pos.messageWebhookRegisterError: The webhook could not be registered at Zettle

connectionDisconnect.headline: You are about to disconnect Zettle
connectionDisconnect.info: Products will no longer be updated and synchronized with your shown Zettle account when disconnecting your account.

connectionSuccess.disclaimer: Any changes you make to your Shopware products will now automatically be updated in your connected Zettle account.
connectionSuccess.headline: Your Zettle and Shopware accounts are now connected!
connectionSuccess.info: Follow the next steps to finish setting up product synchronisation.

customization.subtitle: Zettle will use this domain to download media associated with your synchronized products.

finish.firstParagraph: Your Zettle account is now linked to your Sales Channel and your products will be transferred to Zettle. In the future, when you make a sale, we will update your stock in Zettle and Shopware.
finish.secondParagraph: If you need to update your products, we recommend you do this in Shopware and they'll synchronize to your Zettle app automatically.

productSelection.info: To get started quicker you now have the option to assign products from an existing Sales Channel to your newly created one. All assigned products will then be available for synchronisation in Zettle POS. No manual work needed.
productSelection.modalTitle: Transfer products from existing Sales Channel

syncLibrary.description: All products are synchronized from your newly created Sales Channel in Shopware. How would you like to setup your Zettle library?
syncLibrary.disclaimer: You can change these settings later at any time.
syncLibrary.optionReplaceNotDescription: Your Shopware products and stock quantities will be added to your existing Zettle library.
syncLibrary.optionReplaceOneTimeDescription: Replace your existing Zettle library with products and stock quantities from Shopware once.
syncLibrary.optionReplacePermanentlyDescription: Only your Shopware products and stock quantities will exist in your Zettle library.
syncLibrary.posProducts: no Zettle products | one Zettle product | {n} Zettle products
syncLibrary.shopwareProducts: no Shopware products | one Shopware product | {n} Shopware products

syncPrices.description: Your products’ prices will include VAT when synchronized to Zettle.
syncPrices.disclaimer: You can edit your VAT manually in the Zettle product library.
syncPrices.header: How would you like to synchronize product prices with Zettle?
syncPrices.optionFalseDescription: Product prices will not be transferred on synchronisation. You can set them in your Zettle product library.
syncPrices.optionTrueDescription: Prices synchronized to Zettle will include VAT.

swag-paypal-settings-shipping-carrier.cardHelpText: Tracking information will be sent to PayPal
swag-paypal-settings-shipping-carrier.description: PayPal offers tracking for orders processed through PayPal. To use this, specify a default shipping carrier, which can be overwritten in the orders. Find a list of all shipping providers here
swag-paypal-settings-shipping-carrier.inputHelpText: Select "Other" to enter a custom carrier name.
swag-paypal-settings-shipping-carrier.inputHelpTextOther: If your carrier is not included in the list, enter the name here. Leave empty to use the name of the shipping method.
swag-paypal-settings-shipping-carrier.inputPlaceholder: Select a PayPal carrier code (e.g. DHL_GLOBAL_ECOMMERCE)...
swag-paypal-settings-shipping-carrier.invalid: The provided carrier code is invalid. Please choose one from the list or select "Other".
